lines.text:
[on phone]
No, the doctor isn't in just now. Oh, he won't be back for a long, long time. He went out on one of those eternity cases.
Won't you join me in a glass of wine?
You get in first, and if there's room enough I'll join you.
[Peggy finds a litter of assorted kittens on her seat]
I wonder what their parents were.
Careless, my little dove cake, careless.
Are you going to marry a millionaire ?
I never marry anything else.
Hey! Where am I?
Wu-Hu.
Woo-Hoo to you sweetheart. Hey Charlie, where am I?
WU-HU!
[Professor Quail removes the flower from his lapel]
Don't let the posey fool you!
I'm the manager of this hotel.
I wouldn't brag about it if I were you.
[Professor Quail enters during Rudy Vallee's song]
How long's this dogfight been going on?
I'm sitting on something!
I lost mine in the stock market.

[looking through key hole]
What won't they think up next?
